partners_banner.title: Partner with Lattice
partners_banner.partner_description: We don’t only want to invest in knowledge and fulfill the customers and developers needs – we want to give a platform to you as partner as well. We’re already teaming up with great names and experienced partners. If you need a platform – join us and benefit form a variety of advantages. We welcome you!

benefit_section.title: Your advantages to partner up with LEC2
benefit_section.description:
Single Access Point

Use one platform for all Lattice related education services

Management, Organization and Logistics Marketing

Gain visibility and exposure through our website, congresses and exhibitions, promotion through newsletters, press and social media

Exchange ideas with experts and use the synergies

custom_data.testimonial_client_description: “As an experienced manufacturer of Lattice modules, we are excited about the new LEC2 education platform and supporting the training for Lattice FPGAs with our know-how in hardware design. These both components complement each other very well and provide to the customer a complete package to get started with his own design.”

join_with_us.title: Join our partner network!
join_with_us.description: We cooperate with many partners from various industries and offer a worldwide partner network of experts. So don't wait, become a part of this network and benefit from synergies!
